mapper.select: select type, count(type) as count from sys_message where readed = #readed# and receiver = #receiver# group by type
select type, receiver, count(1) as count from sys_message where readed = #readed# and receiver in(#receivers#) group by type, receiver

select sm.*, va.attr_name typeName, case sm.sender when 'system' then '系统' else su.username end senderName, su2.username receiverName from sys_message sm left join sys_user su on sm.sender = su.id left join sys_user su2 on sm.receiver = su2.id left join ( select attr_value, attr_name from v_sys_dict_attr where dict_code = 'message-type' ) va on va.attr_value = concat(sm.type, '') where 1=1 [[ and content like concat(concat('%', #content#), '%') ]] [[ and sm.receiver = #receiver# ]]
